institution: TEK-UP – Private Higher School of Engineering and Digital Technologies
points: Pursuing an engineering degree in Computer Science with focus on software engineering, networking, cloud computing, and artificial intelligence.
Building expertise in scalable software solutions, distributed systems, and secure systems.

Taking advantage of TEK-UP’s strong certification ecosystem, with opportunities to earn globally recognized credentials from Cisco, Amazon Web Services (AWS), Google Developers, and Red Hat.
Exploring AI-driven applications and cloud-connected systems while preparing for certifications that enhance both technical and professional growth.

degree: B.Sc. in Computer Engineering (IoT & Embedded Systems)
institution: Higher Institute of Computer Science of Mahdia
points: Specialized in Internet of Things (IoT) and embedded systems with a strong foundation in computer engineering.
